Core:PCProperties.Core:Property:
(\{ "members", "Protection for hire\
\\r\\nSmuggling black market items\
\\r\\nGuarding transports and shipments\
\\r\\nHigh stakes gambling\
\\r\\nCollecting from properties\
\\r\\nProstitution\\\r\\n\\r\\n\\r\\n" \})

(\{ "members", "\\"Tonight we conduct the sacred ritual of Initiation to La'Familia. This ritual is secret, and may only be observed by Fratellos and Sorellas of the family. Who is present?\\"\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n[Pause for identification]\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n[Light a candle]\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\\"The light and those present hereby witness the Initiation of NAME into La Familia. This is your final opportunity to turn back, before your life is dedicated to this family. Do you wish to continue?\\"\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n[Pause for confirmation]\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\\"Give me your hand\\"\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n[Prick finger, draw blood]\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\\"This drop of blood means we are now Family, and bound until death. Now, each drop of blood confirms your commitment to our Code.\\"\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n[Consigliere reads the Code, after each statement one drop of blood is squeezed from the finger]\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\\"I have observed NAME commit, through their own free will, to the Code of La Familia. If they fulfill these commitments, let them enjoy the fruits of our family's labors. If they betray these commitments, let them suffer death. Who here has witnessed?\\"\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n[Observing members state \\"So witnessed\\", and the black gold torc is presented]\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\\"Let me be the first, to welcome Fratellos/Sorellas NAME to La Familia\\"\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n[Hug and kiss on cheeks, and the ceremony is concluded]" \})

(\{ "members", "1. Padrone - Leader\
\\r\\n2. Consigliere - Second in command (must be \\"made\\")\
\\r\\n3. Fratellos and Sorellas - \\"Made\\" senior members\
\\r\\n4. Cugino - Junior member\
\\r\\n5. Friend - Favored Outsider\
" \})

(\{ "members", "\The Code of 5 is the agreement that the five \\"made\\" members will adhere to, and also demand of any lesser proteges.\
\
\\\r\\n\\r\\n1. Protect the family, never betray our members\
\\r\\n2. Keep your word, and follow through on orders\
\\r\\n3. Never engage in a battle you can't win\
\\r\\n4. Never speak business to outsiders, especially the Law\
\\r\\n5. Never complain in the face of adversity, including punishment\
" \})
